# MLShapedArrayBufferLayout.strides(_:)

**Case**

Layout scalars according to the strides.

## Declaration

```swift
case strides([Int])
```

## Buffer layouts

- **MLShapedArrayBufferLayout.firstMajorContiguous**: Layout scalars contiguously in first-major order.
- **MLShapedArrayBufferLayout.lastMajorContiguous**: Layout scalars contiguously in last-major order.
